channel.title: My own tutorial page: Including some useful stuff
channel.description:
Ill be updating this later if anybody wanted to add their own tut then just ask or post it :)
http://defsworld.smfforfree3.com/index.php/board,4.0.html
If you like it please take the time the time to sign up. Post youre comments.
lol and I don't know if I am aloud to do this so a mod may lock me if im not.

item.title: My own tutorial page: Including some useful stuff
item.dc:creator: @def_job def job
item.description:
@def_job wrote:

Mod andy your not a mod, stop trying to be one. Also Ive heard many complaints about the deletion of all the tutorials so thought I’d remake some of the old tuts.

And by the way ths is a help section and many people are finding this useful so it’s not spam.

Read full topic
item.source: My own tutorial page: Including some useful stuff
